tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE CloudComputingData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, company_name VARCHAR(50), service_offered VARCHAR(100), location VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE cloud_providers (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(50), headquarters_location VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE cloud_services (service_id INT PRIMARY KEY, service_name VARCHAR(50), provider_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES cloud_providers(provider_id))
CREATE TABLE cloud_providers (provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY, provider_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
